title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: I am unable to assign any command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. When I try to reassign the key via the key preference page, it wrongly displays Ctrl+Del when I press Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German keyboard and Swiss German locale.
OB: The expected behavior is that pressing Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.
EB: Instead, the keybinding manager incorrectly interprets Ctrl+Backspace as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.
SR: The issue seems to be with the keybinding manager, which is not recognizing Ctrl+Backspace correctly with my specific keyboard and locale settings.
